PSXMacroDefinition.Name: $lastPublicRevision
PSXMacroDefinition.Description: Retrieves the last public revision of the current item, returns -1 if the item has never been public. The processed request must supply the contentid as HTML parameter or backend column.

PSXMacroDefinition.Name: $contextDependentRevision
PSXMacroDefinition.Description: Retrieves the current revision for the preview context (0). For all other contexts the last public revision of the current item or -1 if the item has never been public is returned. The processed request must supply the contentid as HTML parameter or backend column and the current revision as a backend column. The context is retrieved from the HTML parameters and defaults to preview (0) if not supplied.
